name: Thomas' Utility Disk
short_description:
Thomas' utilities for Macintosh and Windows:

This is a colletion of utilities I wrote; each of which statisfies a particular itch. The software is broken down by platform; minimal documentation is available for each item. I welcome all feedback (bugs
